data.name: 飞越13号房
data.detailed_description:
Unguided youth grow recklessly, an electrified instrument, they become sick in the eyes of all.
Uncomprehended ardour does not respond, a cold door, they become islands in the black ocean.

The story takes place in the early 21st century, between a group of lost teenagers and a behavior correctional center. This work is adapted from Orange Light. Players enter the story from the perspective of the protagonist, from the "rebellious teenager" at the beginning to being sent to the behavior correctional center in South East Asia, and goes deep into it with the characters.


Players will experience multiple interactive gameplay, including branching storylines, QTE, clue collection, reasoning synthesis, real-time monitoring, escape room puzzles, electric shock gameplay, etc.


Though always strolling like a master player in the game world, you are someone that people call the ‘little punk’ in your real life. Your mother, who gives up on you, finally decides to send you to this correctional center. It claims that countless teens are cured by its headmaster, Professor Yang. In the name of "gratitude", you undergo a series of "transformation" programs - verbal abuse, corporal punishment, confinement, beatings, and electroshock therapy in Room 13.

Escape , if you can make subtle moves
Investigate , if you can find the hidden truth
Scheme , if you can gain the trust of your partners
Go home , if you can make your own smart choice.

In the face of all these challenges, you not only control your own destiny, but also influence the final outcome of your companions and this correction center.

"If I just get out of here, this fear will stay with me for the rest of my life, and I have to prove him wrong before we can really go home."


  • A captivating story - A cinematic interactive experience, you can truly feel the emotion of the characters, gradually delve into the "transformation" plan, and uncover the truth behind the correction center.
  • Branching storylines - Hundreds of branching paths, eight main endings, and hidden plots throughout. Make choices, and shape your "Hero's Journey".
  • Friend and foe companion - The relationship development of different characters may unlock the assembly of a team.
  • Your Special Treatment - In Professor Yang's Room 13, you can say what you want to say, what you should say and what you didn't have the chance to say, and feel the light and electricity.

data.short_description: Breakout is a narrative adventure game with interactive cinematic experience. It is about a group of misguided youths, who are sent to a correctional center and try to escape.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core i3 / AMD A6 2.4Ghz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
